name: SPACE BALL JUMPER
description:
Tilt your smartphone to move the ball:

- forwards to accelerate

- backwards to decelerate

- on the left to move to the left

- on the right to move to the right

Touch the screen in order to jump.

The aim of the game is to reach the black hole platforms(i.e the end of the levels), getting as much points as possible. The total score depends also on the time used to finish each level, but be carefull not to fall down into the deep space, it will reduce your planet lives.

Enjoy your game!!!
